attributes.action: Recognise the importance role that the local post office plays in society
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ability to pay (free of charge) utility bills, Road tax, Tv licence, council tax etc at your local post office should be allowed and recognised as a important factor in helping to keep post offices open and should be encourage and facilitated by goverment not undermined.
Goverment should recognise that keeping as many of these services local will help reduce O2 emmisions as wells as support local shops that are important for people who are no longer able to get about as easily as the used to.
